name: Deep In Mind
description:
You are lost in your own mind. The past reveals itself through exploration. But it can disappear as quickly as it came. Can you find a way out?

The game runs better when downloaded than in the web version

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys
Gameplay

The game features a memory mechanic. As you collect new memories, the world around you changes, opening the path to collect new memories. The game is mostly story focused but it plays with its unique mechanics

Story

This isn't a game that tells you its story in a normal way. You have to interpret it

Made by Finn Pickart - Kindred Community Jam #6 - 2021
